snippet.title: Rolling Gunner PV English Ver
snippet.description:
Full-fledged side scrolling shooting game Rolling Gunner (Japanese package version) has released!
Soundtrack is also released at the same time.
( Release date August 10, 2018) 

Currently you can purchase from the following site.

★AKIBAHOBBY
https://ovs.akbh.jp/products/detail.php?product_id=2100000095728
https://ovs.akbh.jp/products/detail.php?product_id=2100000095735

★NANAPO's STORE
http://www.7-iro.org/store/

★BEEP
https://www.beep-shop.com/ec/products/detail/518
https://www.beep-shop.com/ec/products/detail/519


Customers outside of Japan, overseas shipment is possible with "AKIBAHOBBY" and "NANAPO's STORE".

Please try playing by all means!

※ Sorry, the online sales version will be over half a year later


The trial version of rolling gunner can be downloaded from the following. Please try and experience it by all means.
https://rollinggunner.wixsite.com/rollinggunner/download
